ygData.subject: Re: Lil bit from an Enchanter
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree 100%. I think all caster should be penalized for resist exactly the same way. Why is it necros get a spell that can t be resisted? Just think its total
ygData.messageBody:
I agree 100%. I think all caster should be penalized for resist exactly the same way. Why is it necros get a spell that can't be resisted? Just think its total BS.
-----Original Message-----
From: Fondain De'Illusion <Fondain@...>
To: Eq Spell Research <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 7:04 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Lil bit from an Enchanter


Just a lil point,
I have watched a group of lvl 16 necros kill sand giants.... Ok, thats fine, but here is what irks me. I realize that as an enchanter I am not expected to do the offense like wizards, magicians or even necros, Our prime directive is debuffing and buffing and we get some incredible spells. Here are my rants.
1. we don't get enought buff or debuff that only WE have. Why do other classes get beserker str? Thats unbeknownst to me.
2. Ok, i can understand perhaps them resisting our offensive dmg spells but how are we supposed to be a group debuffer if they resist all our spells? Even after using tashan or tashanii which also have a tendency to get resisted? Kinda makes us useless in that regard eh?

Just a few things im kinda irked about...


Fondain De'Illusion, Master Enchanter of the Amber Knights, Tarew Marr
